description: Standard and heavy-duty base plate connections with anchor bolt patterns, stiffener plates, and grout details.
boltDetails: M24 anchor bolts, Grade 8.8, 4-bolt and 8-bolt patterns

description: Flush and extended end plate moment connections for beam-to-column joints with full bolt detailing.
boltDetails: M20 HSFG bolts, Grade 10.9, 6-bolt extended end plate

description: Double angle web cleat connections for simple beam-to-beam and beam-to-column shear connections.

boltDetails: M20 bolts, Grade 8.8 with stiffener plates

description: Fully welded and bolted moment connections for rigid frame joints with complete CJP weld specifications.
boltDetails: M24 HSFG bolts, CJP welds to flanges
